body.p: A select list can read its list values from the MVC model, as well as being used to display and update values in the model. If a select list element has a 'data' attribute then the list's items are generated using the data stored in the model at that location.

ul.li: The list data must be specified as an array.
A 2-dimensional array can be used to specify (value,label) tuples for each list item.
The select list is refreshed whenever the list data is updated in the model.
Any options defined in the select list's HTML are preserved and are always present on the list (this is useful for 'Please select...' options).

body.p:
In the following sample, the select list is described using the following HTML:
<select name="color" data="color-list"> <option value="">Please select a color...</option> </select>
